message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we settle at $13,000?
I understand the product has value, but $13,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
